abstract: Last month, Citigroup filled the latest in a series of c-suite positions, only this time with a twist: The firm named a senior banker as its chief client officer. Read the full memo on DealBook.

lead_paragraph: Over the last year, Citigroup has added many c-suite positions, so named for the word chief in their titles. Some of these are common positions: chief financial officer, chief administrative officer, chief risk officer and, of course, chief executive, meaning Vikram S. Pandit.

headline.main: Citi Adds Client Chief to Its C-Suite
